trans-unit.source: In Xcode, press **Run** and start the app on an iOS device (not the simulator.) Click **OK** to accept push notifications; this request occurs the first time the app runs.
trans-unit.target: In Xcode, press **Run** and start the app on an iOS device (not the simulator.) Click **OK** to accept push notifications; this request occurs the first time the app runs.

trans-unit.source: In the app, add a new item and click **+**.
trans-unit.target: In the app, add a new item and click **+**.

trans-unit.source: Verify that a notification is received, then click **OK** to dismiss the notification.
trans-unit.target: Verify that a notification is received, then click **OK** to dismiss the notification.

trans-unit.source: You have now successfully completed this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You have now successfully completed this tutorial.
